title: Frontend for crypto site
description: Cryptolounge is a website for managing crypto. My own work is landing page, login & singup page and dashboard for crypto. The entire site is in framework Svelte combined with CSS framework TailwindCSS.

title: Frontend & backend of chat application
description: My school finals on subject programming. It is a fullstack web chat app. Took a lot of effort which paid off. I am very happy I made it work. It is made in Typescript, MongoDB, ExpressJS, Svelte and TailwindCSS.

title: Extraordinary Gifts
description: Minecraft plugin that implements creation of gifts. It has built-in GUI and more extended configuration than other plugins. It is the perfect solution for survival servers that want to spice up their gameplay.

title: Diamond Nuggets V2
description: Fork from already existing Diamond Nuggets plugin. It is a plugin that allows players to create diamond nuggets. I only added more customization and fixed some bugs.
